pr_title: Fix DockerTest leaves running container OKAPI-913

timeline.message:
Fix DockerTest leaves running container OKAPI-913

The case where a container is started and a port is already being
in use (falure), did not stop the container as it should. This
regression was introduced with the OKAPI-899 work.

timeline.author: julianladisch

replies.bodyText: ok. Hasn't been a problem, but it makes sense
replies.author: adamdickmeiss
